thread.title: 10 of the World’s Top Adventure Resorts for Summer Travel [SLIDESHOW]
thread.title_full: 10 of the World’s Top Adventure Resorts for Summer Travel [SLIDESHOW]

author: Compiled by Rebekah Bell
title: 10 of the World’s Top Adventure Resorts for Summer Travel [SLIDESHOW]
text:
Compiled by Rebekah Bell JULY 22, 2015 
For the thrill seeker who knows there is more to summer vacation than sunbathing on exotic beaches, here is our roundup of the world’s top adventure resorts. Scuba dive in Turkey, explore secret coves in Vietnam, embark on a boat tour of Malaysia, and experience the joy of the road less traveled.
